external_games.name: Hidden Object: Mystery of Notre Dame de Paris

name: Hidden Object: Mystery of Notre Dame de Paris
summary: You have never been so scared playing a game in the hidden object genre. In this game you will reveal the secret of the Cathedral of Notre Dame de Paris, as well as investigate a murder. The more you are involved in the game the more you understand that the murder investigation is covered with darkness and mysticism. You must find a killer and unravel the mysteries associated with Notre Dame de Paris.
